title: Rhotrini Fontes
description: Ancient springs, mentioned by Livy in his account of the military campaign of Gnaeus Manlius Vulso (consul of 189 BCE) in "Gallograecia" in Asia Minor. Scholars identify these "fontes" with the water source (Pınarbaşı) feeding the modern Karakuyu/Çapalı Gölü in Turkey's Afyonkarahisar province.

properties.description: Modern restaurant on the shore of the Çapalı/Karakuyu marsh/lake, associated with the springs that feed the lake and with Roman-era epigraphic finds mentioned by Christol and Drew-Bear.
properties.title: Imagery location of modern Pınarbaşı Balık Restaurant

properties.description: Visible upstream terminus(?) of now-defunct, modern above-ground aqueduct at Eldere.
properties.title: Imagery location of modern aqueduct source
